org.platanios.learn.math.matrix

Class LUDecomposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.platanios.learn.math.matrix.LUDecomposition

  • public class LUDecomposition
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the LU decomposition algorithm for matrix \(A\). Given \(A\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}\), with \(m\geq n\), the LU decomposition is an upper triangular matrix \(U\in\mathbb{R}^{n\times n}\), a unit lower triangular matrix \(L\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}\) and a permutation/pivot vector \(\boldsymbol{p}\in\mathbb{R}^m\), such that \(A(\boldsymbol{p},:)=LU\) (the permutation/pivot vector in this equation can be thought of as re-ordering the rows of \(A\)). If \(m<n\), then \(L\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times m}\) and \(U\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}\). The LU decomposition with pivoting always exists, even if the matrix is singular, and so the constructor of this class will never fail. Furthermore, the primary use of the LU decomposition is in the solution of square systems of simultaneous matrix equations. In that case, in order to obtain a solution, the matrix has to be non-singular.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Antonios Platanios

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int columnDimension
      The column dimension of the matrix whose decomposition is being computed.
      private boolean isNonSingular
      A boolean value indicating whether or not the matrix whose decomposition is being computed is non-singular.
      private double[][] LU
      Two-dimensional array used for internal storage of the decomposition factors.
      private int[] pivot
      One-dimensional array used for internal storage of the pivot vector.
      private int pivotSign
      An integer holding the pivot sign.
      private int rowDimension
      The row dimension of the matrix whose decomposition is being computed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LUDecomposition

        public LUDecomposition(Matrix matrix)
        Constructs an LU decomposition object for the provided matrix. The actual decomposition is computed within this constructor using Crout's algorithm.
        Parameters:
        matrix - The matrix whose LU decomposition is being computed.

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public Vector solve(Vector vector)
             throws SingularMatrixException
        Solves the linear system of equations \(A\boldsymbol{x}=\boldsymbol{b}\) for \(\boldsymbol{x}\) and returns the result as a new vector. The solution is obtained efficiently by using the LU decomposition.
        Parameters:
        vector - Vector \(\boldsymbol{b}\) in equation \(A\boldsymbol{x}=\boldsymbol{b}\).
        Returns:
        The solution of the system of equations.
        Throws:
        SingularMatrixException

      • solve

        public Matrix solve(Matrix matrix)
             throws SingularMatrixException
        Solves the linear system of equations \(AX=B\) for \(X\) and returns the result as a new matrix. The solution is obtained efficiently by using the LU decomposition.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix \(B\) in equation \(AX=B\).
        Returns:
        The solution of the system of linear equations.
        Throws:
        SingularMatrixException
